Text.text: Receipt of order, Approved MDS 0 date; Duration : Milestone *To + 6 Weeks : Design and Drawing preparation and approval from CCOE-PESO office To + 12 Weeks : Material procurement To + 24 Weeks : Manufacturing, NDT clearance To + 26 Weeks : Surface preparation, primer painting To + 27 Weeks : Dispatch of 1st consignment ( 6 Pieces ) To + 31 Weeks : Dispatch of 2nd consignment ( 6 Pieces )

10% Total Contracts Price shall be released after submission of following documents: a) Corporate Guarantee for advance equivalent to 10% of Total Contract Price. b) Correct Proforma invoice c) Corporate Performance Guarantee for 10% of Total Contract Price to be submitted within 15 days from the date of PO date. d Unconditional acceptance of Purchase Order. 2) 10% Total Contract Price shall be released after design and drawing approval and submission of Corporate Guarantee of equivalent amount. 3) 20% Total Contracts Price shall be released within 30 days upon receipt of major materials like: a) Plates b) Corporate Guarantee of equivalent amount. 4. 30% of the Total Contract Price shall be payable within 30 days after dispatch. 5. 10% of the Total Contract Price shall be payable within 30 days upon successful Hydrotest at site 6.15% of the Total Contract Price shall be payable within 30 days upon successful NDT at site 6. 5% of the Total Contract Price shall be payable within 30 days upon handing over of Tank , submission of as built Drawings and Final Document Dossier. All payment shall be released after completion of approved milestone. Payments shall be released through NEFT/RTGS/Bank to Bank transfer upon receipt of certified invoice. All invoices for payments must mention TPL job no. OG-500047-ISRO-SIET. Commercial Invoices shall be consigned to M/s Tata Projects Limited, Floor 2, Transocean House, Lake Boulevard Road, Hiranandani Business Park, Powai, Mumbai-400 076, India. All Bank Guarantees shall be as per TPL formats and shall be sent to TPL, RO Mumbai at Powai.
0.5% (Half percent) of Total Contract Price, subject to a maximum of 5% (Five percent) of the Total Contract Price, for each calendar week of delay or part thereof.

TextArea.value: Warranty for the performance of all the Ordered items/packages under the Contract, against any manufacturing defects, for the period of 18 (Eighteen) months from the date of issue of certificate of completion and final acceptance in writing by TPL and/or ISRO or 36 (Thirty-Six) months from the date of last supply at project site, whichever is earlier. During this period, all the relevant cost towards repair and/or replacement of defective parts/items shall be borne by Supplier. Any part / item repaired and/or replaced shall be under a further warranty for a period of 12 months from the date of acceptance of such repaired and/or replaced part/ item.

Text.text: Corporate Guarantee shall be provided valid until the expiry of Defect Liability Period with further claim period validity of Six (06) months.
Mr.Prashant Bachhav, Mob No:9860252880/ Mr.Saket Mathur ,Mob No:7095557701

(1) 10% of Total Contract Value shall be payable as advance against submission of following documents: (a) Advance Bank Guarantee (ABG) of equivalent amount (10%). (b) Submission of Contract Performance Bank Guarantee (CPBG) of 10% of Total Contract Price as mentioned under Clause no-11 of this SCC. (c) Unconditional acceptance of the LOA and/or PO. (d) QAP/ITP, Data sheets, drawings and other related engineering inputs/ documents for providing manufacturing clearance. (e) Correct Original Pro-Forma Invoice to claim Advance amount. (2) 70% of Total Contract Value shall be payable upon receipt of all the materials/equipment at ISRO project site after successful inspection, issuance of Acceptance Cum Release Note (ACRN) by TPL and against submission of Original invoice copy. (3) 10% of Total Contract Value shall be payable upon successful commissioning, Performance Guarantee Test Run (PGTR) and final acceptance by TPL and/or ISRO. (4) 10% of Total Contract Value shall be payable upon receipt of As built Drawings, Final Document Dossier O M manual. All payment terms shall be on pro-rata basis. Payment shall be released within 45 days via E-payment system” (through NEFT/RTGS/Bank to Bank transfer) and on submission of certified invoices as per the instructions in the Purchase Order.
LD of 0.5% for per weeks delay to a max. 5% of PO value

TextArea.value: Warranty for the performance of all the Ordered items/packages under the Contract, against any manufacturing defects, for the period of 12 (Twelve) months from the date of issue of certificate of completion and final acceptance in writing by TPL and/or ISRO or 15 (Fifteen) months from the date of last supply at project site, whichever is earlier. Warrantee shall not apply to wear tear parts, rubber seals, gasket etc and shall not apply in case of improper/operations and modifications or repairs incorrectly carried out.

Text.text: 10% CPBG shall be submitted within 10 days from the date of receipt of this Contract

(1) 10% of Total Contract Value shall be payable as advance against submission of following documents: (a) Advance Bank Guarantee (ABG) of equivalent amount (10%). (b) Submission of Contract Performance Bank Guarantee (CPBG) of 10% of Total Contract Price as mentioned under Clause no-11 of this SCC. (c) Unconditional acceptance of the LOA and/or PO. (d) QAP/ITP, Data sheets, drawings and other related engineering inputs/documents for providing manufacturing clearance. (e) Correct Original Pro-Forma Invoice to claim Advance amount. (2) 70% of Total Contract Value shall be payable upon receipt of all the materials/equipment at ISRO project site after successful inspection, issuance of Acceptance Cum Release Note (ACRN) by TPL and against submission of Original invoice copy. (3) 10% of Total Contract Value shall be payable upon successful commissioning, Performance Guarantee Test Run (PGTR) and final acceptance by TPL and/or ISRO. (4) 10% of Total Contract Value shall be payable upon receipt of As built Drawings, Final Document Dossier O M manual. All payment terms shall be on pro-rata basis. Payment shall be released within 45 days via E-payment system” (through NEFT/RTGS/Bank to Bank transfer) and on submission of certified invoices as per the instructions in the Purchase Order.
LD of 0.5% for per weeks delay to a max. 5% of PO value

TextArea.value: Warranty for the performance of all the Ordered items/packages under the Contract, against any manufacturing defects, for the period of 12 (Twelve) months from the date of issue of certificate of completion and final acceptance in writing by TPL and/or ISRO or 15 (Fifteen) months from the date of last supply at project site, whichever is earlier. Warrantee shall not apply to wear tear parts, rubber seals, gasket etc and shall not apply in case of improper/operations and modifications or repairs incorrectly carried out.

Text.text: 10% CPBG shall be submitted within 10 days from the date of receipt of this Contract
Delivery shall be 18 -24 months from the date of receipt of PO / Drawing Approval / Manufacturing Clearance whichever is later.

10% advance along with PO • 10% against submission of Drawings QAP • 30% against identification of Major Raw materials (Plates) • 30% against pro rate completion of Pre fabrication • 10% against pro rate completion of Hydro testing • 10% against pro rate final completion Handing over
LD of 0.5% for per weeks delay to a max. 5% of PO value

TextArea.value: The Air storage Vessels are guaranteed for mechanical workmanship for a period of 12 months from the date of commissioning or 18 months from the date of dispatch whichever is earlier.

Text.text: Delivery shall be 18 -24 months from the date of receipt of PO / Drawing Approval / Manufacturing Clearance whichever is later.

TextArea.value: The Air storage Vessels are guaranteed for mechanical workmanship for a period of 12 months from the date of commissioning or 18 months from the date of dispatch whichever is earlier.

Text.text: 1) For 10% advane payment purpose QAP/IPT, Datasheets, drawings and related documents requirement may please be removed as it will take 12 weeks time for completion. (2) 70% payment through irrevocable LC (from a first class bank which is rated not less than A- by S and P or A3 by Moody against despatch documents on prorata basis for each Vessel (3 ) 15% payment due against the commissioning may please be released against submission of equivalent BG or irrecovable LC ( from a first class bank which is rated not less than A- by S and P or A3 by Moody s) which will be valid upto final acceptance by TPL (4) 5% payment due against receipt of As built drawings may please be released against submission of equivalent BG which will be valid upto submission of As built drawings

TextArea.value: 12 Months from the date of Blowdown or 18 Months from Supply

Text.text: 10% CPBG shall be submitted within 10 days from the date of receipt of this Contract.

1) For 10% advance payment purpose QAP/IPT, Datasheets, drawings and related documents requirement may please be removed as it will take 12 weeks time for completion. (2) 70% payment through irrevocable LC (from a first-class bank which is rated not less than A- by S and P or A3 by Moody against despatch documents on a prorata basis for each Vessel (3 ) 15% payment due against the commissioning may please be released against submission of equivalent BG or irrevocable LC ( from a first-class bank which is rated not less than A- by S and P or A3 by Moody s) which will be valid up to final acceptance by TPL (4) 5% payment due against receipt of As-built drawings may please be released against submission of equivalent BG which will be valid up to submission of As-built drawings

Title.text: ASP Water and Power Projects Pvt Ltd

Text.text: The payment terms shall be as follows:(1) 10% of Total Contract Value shall be payable as advance against submission of following documents: (a) Advance Bank Guarantee (ABG) of equivalent amount (10%). (b) Submission of Contract Performance Bank Guarantee (CPBG) of 10% of Total Contract Price (c) Unconditional acceptance of the LOA and/or PO. (d) QAP/ITP, Data sheets, drawings and other related engineering inputs/ documents for providing manufacturing clearance. (e) Correct Original Pro-Forma Invoice to claim Advance amount.(2) 70% of Total Contract Value shall be payable upon receipt of all the materials/equipment at ISRO project site after successful inspection, issuance of Acceptance Cum Release Note (ACRN) by TPL and against submission of Original invoice copy.(3) 10% of Total Contract Value shall be payable upon successful commissioning, Performance Guarantee Test Run (PGTR) and final acceptance by TPL and/or ISRO.(4) 10% of Total Contract Value shall be payable upon receipt of As built Drawings, Final Document Dossier and O qand M manual.All payment terms shall be on pro-rata basis. Payment shall be released within 45 days via E-payment systemâ€ (through NEFT/RTGS/Bank to Bank transfer) and on submission of certified invoices as per the instructions in the Purchase Order.All invoices for payments must mention TPL job no. OG-500047, shall be raised in the name of M/s. Tata Projects Limited and shall be sent as detailed in the Purchase Order.

upplier shall provide warranty for the performance of all the Ordered items/packages under the Contract, against any manufacturing defects, for the period of 24 (Twenty Four) months from the date of first Blow Down (i.e. tentalively 05-May-2021) and final acceptance in writing by TPL and/or ISRO or 40 (Forty) months from the date of last supply at project site

(e) Correct Original Pro-Forma Invoice to claim Advance amount.(2) 70% of Total Contract Value shall be payable upon receipt of all the materials/equipment at ISRO project site after successful inspection, issuance of Acceptance Cum Release Note (ACRN) by TPL and against submission of Original invoice copy.(3) 10% of Total Contract Value shall be payable upon successful commissioning, Performance Guarantee Test Run (PGTR) and final acceptance by TPL and/or ISRO.(4) 10% of Total Contract Value shall be payable upon receipt of As-built Drawings, Final Document Dossier and O qand M manual.All payment terms shall be on a pro-rata basis. Supplier shall provide warranty for the performance of all the Ordered items/packages under the Contract, against any manufacturing defects, for the period of 24 (Twenty Four) months from the date of the first Blow Down (i.e. tentatively 05-May-2021) and final acceptance in writing by TPL and/or ISRO or 40 (Forty) months from the date of the last supply at the project site
